entry.string: The Base Module controls the behind the scenes processing for your Xaraya installation.
entry.translation: Zee Bese-a Mudoole-a cuntruls zee beheend zee scenes prucesseeng fur yuoor Xereya instelleshun.

entry.string: From the menu, you have two choices.
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a tvu chueeces. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: View System Information -- Allows you to print your server and php set-up for trouble shooting.
entry.translation: Feeoo System Inffurmeshun -- Elloos yuoo tu preent yuoor serfer und php set-up fur truooble-a shuuteeng.

entry.string: Modify Config -- Allows you to change some of the settings controlling the core behaviour of the site.
entry.translation: Mudeeffy Cunffeeg -- Elloos yuoo tu chunge-a sume-a ooff zee setteengs cuntrulleeng zee cure-a behefeeuoor ooff zee seete-a.

entry.string: The RSS capabilities in Xaraya use PHP feedParser as their backend. The notes for the feedParser by Reverend Jim are as follows:
entry.translation: Zee RSS cepebeelities in Xereya use-a PHP feedPerser es zeeur beckend. Bork bork bork! Zee nutes fur zee feedPerser by Referend Jeem ere-a es fulloos:

entry.string: feedParser was created due to the lack of a good, flexible, class-based RSS feed parser for PHP. It has been built as a class, and currently handles RSS 0.91, RSS 0.92, RSS 0.93, RSS 1.0, and RSS 2.0 feeds. For channels it grabs the title, description, link, and creator. For items it grabs the title, description, link, and date. It also provides a form of the date converted into the local timezone to facilitate chronological sorting of items. The dates are provided in UNIX timestamp format for easy manipulation by other PHP functions.
entry.translation: feedPerser ves creeted dooe-a tu zee leck ooff a guud, flexeeble-a, cless-besed RSS feed perser fur PHP. It hes beee booeelt es a cless, und coorrently hundles RSS 0.91, RSS 0.92, RSS 0.93, RSS 1.0, und RSS 2.0 feeds. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Fur chunnels it grebs zee teetle-a, descreepshun, leenk, und creetur. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Fur items it grebs zee teetle-a, descreepshun, leenk, und dete-a. It elsu prufeedes a furm ooff zee dete-a cunferted intu zee lucel teemezune-a tu feceelitete-a chrunulugeecel surteeng ooff items. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Zee detes ere-a prufeeded in UNIX teemestemp furmet fur iesy muneepooleshun by oozeer PHP fooncshuns. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Currently, the HTML and Text blocks can both expire content if you wish. If you have a message that you would like to only have visible for a certain period of time, you can expire the block. This functionality can be used in conjunction with any placement or block group that you assign the block.
entry.translation: Coorrently, zee HTML und Text blucks cun but ixpure-a cuntent iff yuoo veesh. Iff yuoo hefe-a a messege-a thet yuoo vuoold leeke-a tu oonly hefe-a feesible-a fur a certeeen pereeud ooff teeme-a, yuoo cun ixpure-a zee bluck. Thees fooncshuneleety cun be-a used in cunjooncshun veet uny plecement oor bluck gruoop thet yuoo esseegn zee bluck.

entry.string: The Base Module has no hooks included at this time.
entry.translation: Zee Bese-a Mudoole-a hes nu huuks inclooded et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond here-a. [mudooles mudoole-a]
